entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as someone who knows about protective charms and spells.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one searching for a locket behind Umbridge's desk.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch's filing cabinets at Hogwarts are mentioned as similar to the one Harry is searching.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley's file is found in the bottommost drawer of the filing cabinet.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is mentioned as an organization that Mr. Weasley is a member of.

relationships.description: Harry is searching behind Umbridge's desk.
Harry found Mr. Weasley's file in the bottommost drawer of the filing cabinet.
